attributes.action: give british service personnel and veterans serving prison sentences or about to serve prison sentences a full a comprehensive mental health medical
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the amount of veterans of the armed forces serving prison sentences warrants a review on how and why so many ex-service personnel end up in prison many with mental health problems.these men and women were fit and healthy before being accepted for service in the forces .honour the covenant.
